timeline.bodyText: Are there other exporters that we want to support in the future that have endpoints as well, or is it just Prometheus?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: I think the k8s stuff can only look for one scrape path... I left room here should a different registry extension provide one, but I think only prometheus will.
replies.author: ebullient

timeline.message:
Micrometer extension

Enable MP Metrics if API is present by default
